trustfund: TF037160-TANZANIA - TAX ADMINISTRATION PROJECT,TF028297-IDF TANZANIA REVENUE AUTHORITY ESTABLISHMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Country Assistance Strategy (CAS)
            recognizes that macroeconomic stability is critical for a
            sustained growth in Tanzania, and specifies the need for
            strengthening tax administration. Revenue performance will
            be improved and domestic resources increased on a
            sustainable basis to finance budgetary needs, through the
            support of the Tax Administration Project. The main
            components will: a) improve the legal system to enact laws
            and regulations in taxation, and will introduce regulatory
            taxpayer frameworks, to further establish appeals
            mechanisms; b) increase the number of registered taxpayers
            contributing to a broadened tax base, thus creating a
            rationalization for deductions, exemptions and concessions
            granted by tax laws, to further identify sources of revenue
            for tax base expansion; c) strengthen the Tanzania Revenue
            Authority (TRA), through a re-engineering process,
            computerization of three revenue departments, and improve
            the tax arrears recovery and the control of tax evasion; d)
            improve the administrative infrastructure, with the
            rehabilitation/construction of needed facilities; and, e)
            include a Project Preparation Facility to finance project
            coordination and implementation.
